GrantId.description: Identifier of the grant to be revoked.

KeyId.description: A unique identifier for the customer master key associated with the grant. This value can be a globally unique identifier or the fully specified ARN to a key.   Key ARN Example - arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:123456789012:key/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012   Globally Unique Key ID Example - 12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012
